# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/hexo-util`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for hexo-util (https://hexo.io/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/hexo-util.
